Uses of Class
bftsmart.consensus.Decision

  • Packages that use Decision 
    Package Description
    bftsmart.consensus  
    bftsmart.tom.core  

    • Uses of Decision in bftsmart.consensus

      Methods in bftsmart.consensus that return Decision 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Decision Consensus.getDecision()
      This is the decision instance to which this consensus works for Important: The returned object should only be sent to the delivery thread after this consensus instance decides a value.
      Constructors in bftsmart.consensus with parameters of type Decision 
      Constructor and Description
      Consensus(ExecutionManager manager, Decision decision)
      Creates a new instance of Consensus Important: At this point, the 'decision' parameter is only a placeholder for the future decision, and should not be delivered to the delivery thread.

    • Uses of Decision in bftsmart.tom.core

      Methods in bftsmart.tom.core with parameters of type Decision 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      byte[] TOMLayer.createPropose(Decision dec)
      Creates a value to be proposed to the acceptors.
      void TOMLayer.decided(Decision dec)
      Called by the current consensus instance, to notify the TOM layer that a value was decided
      void DeliveryThread.delivery(Decision dec)
      Invoked by the TOM layer, to deliver a decision
